attributes.action: Publicity Campaign For Motorway Driving Etiquette - Especially Middle Lane Hogging
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To create a campaign using TV, radio and billboard adverts for simple messages regarding Motorway driving rules and etiquette.

Middle-lane hogging should be a particular feature of this campaign so that rush-hour congestion is eased as a result of drivers driving properly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
